title: Bots farming ARAM?
body:
I'm having a ARAM game with 9(I think) bots.
Come on RITO
https://s31.postimg.org/5nmjyscy3/bot.png

replies.body: Its ARAMs theres no point in Riot touching it because they focus on the competitive gameplay and ARAM is the furthest thing from this.
This really needs to be fixed
